Package dbAPI

Class OnlineTable

java.lang.Object
dbAPI.AbstractTable
dbAPI.OnlineTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
ITable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<IRow>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CacheTable, SinglePrimaryKeyCacheTable
public class OnlineTable
extends AbstractTable
Represents a table that requires a connection
